name: Mergical Home-Fun puzzle game
description:
The game where you get to merge all kinds of cool buildings.

Welcome to Mergical Home! In this game, you can merge every single element you see into luxurious pieces of furniture and use them to decorate your mansion! Relax and build your own unique mansion in this free game!

Left abandoned, this house, which used to be a gorgeous mansion, became desolated. But that can all be fixed with your arrival! By following the lead of your little puppy, you can merge elements to clean this mansion up and restore it to its former glory!

You can make an effort to create rare and exotic plants and beautiful flowers to create an elegant garden or merge exquisite furniture to decorate your new home!

In this mansion, there are many cute and cuddly pets. Their entire purpose is to help you design your mansion!

Are you ready to design your amazing mansion? Come on and start your journey!

Features:
-More than 500 elements for you to merge and interact with
-Put three of the same objects next to each other to get a pleasant surprise!
-Harvest from your flowers to collect essence, then use them to clean the rooms in your mansion!
-Merge the cute pets to evolve them so that they can offer more assistance!
-Merge furniture, plants, and flowers to decorate your house to your fullest desire!
-Challenge the fun levels to obtain more rare decorations and use them to decorate your mansion.

Download for free now to start designing, building, and decorating your mansion to make it the best looking house in town!
